participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and ambitious, Jordan enjoys socializing and exploring new opportunities. He has a competitive spirit, especially on the basketball court.
participant_1.background: my mother is a dentist. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister. i am currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and enthusiastic, Sophia thrives on challenges and constantly pushes herself to achieve her goals. She has a cheerful demeanor and a love for sports.
participant_2.background: gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread.
